passages.text:
Please... Let me rest... I was woken up last night to a terrible clatter. It sounded like a large animal. But it made these awful sounds, almost like a scared dog... Someone must have been hunting for the festival...
[[When did you hear these sounds?|When sounds]]
[[I'll let you rest.|Let you rest]]

links.link: When did you hear these sounds?|When sounds

links.name: I'll let you rest.|Let you rest
links.link: I'll let you rest.|Let you rest

passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Oh, I'm sure I don't know... It was dark, but William was not home yet. So it couldn't have been that late... Or perhaps William stayed out longer than usual?
[[continue]]
passages.name: When sounds

passages.text:
Oh, thank you, dear. I do wonder what it could have been, but at my age, I've learned to keep to my own business and not bother others for theirs. It's the wise thing to do...
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Let you rest

passages.text: But, that's a thought for another time. For now, I think I'll just rest my eyes for a moment...
passages.name: Bye

passages.text:
But it matters not... At my age, I've learned to keep to my own business and not bother others for theirs. It's the wise thing to do...
[[Where were the sounds coming from?|Where sounds]]

links.name: Where were the sounds coming from?|Where sounds
links.link: Where were the sounds coming from?|Where sounds

passages.name: continue

passages.text:
My dear, you ask too many questions... I do believe it was simply someone preparing for the festival. Perhaps the farmer was slaughtering a hog he bought from a passing merchant's boat?
[[continue2]]
passages.name: Where sounds

passages.text:
He did seem awfully tired this morning when he delivered my produce... That kind of work really takes the breeze out of your sails.
[[Bye]]
passages.name: continue2
